title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 134.7 - Federal requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 134.7 - Federal requirements

State Regulations

Permittees are advised that Federal regulations, consents, notifications and/or approvals may be applicable for vegetation control in the

State highway right of way. The department may preclude or limit vegetation
control if the department determines that such control may interfere with the

State's participation in Federal programs or receipt of Federal
funding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
134.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
